description: If your lookin to make some good baselines, have a go at this.

I've waited a couple of years to find such a superb drum machine. Over the last months I've been recording with Hydrogen, great drumkit sounds. My musician friends are completely "flabergasted" by the quality of my drum recordings. So easy to use, intuitiv and responsive.However hhe ladspa plugins stopped working.
summary: Excellent software, beginners and pro's should try this... Just Great!

description: this is so good i absolutely love it omg
summary: OMG SUPER GOOD APP! MUST DOWNLOAD

description: it works very well. get an 808 drumkit and youre set
Hydrogen is so easy to use, it is brilliant.

Used this for years, since it is the best I have used for software before. I use the death metal drum kit and Hydrogen is so easy to use and create with. Only thing I did not like was they changed the way you enter how long a pattern is and sometimes it takes me a minute to get the lenght I want in the pattern.
Keine Ahnung was das sein soll.
Hab's aus versehen installiert. Scheint zu machen, was es soll, aber lässt sich nicht entfernen…
Funktioniert wie es soll. Klare Empfehlung.
summary: Super Möglichkeiten und schnell zu verstehen

description: läuft einwandfrei, nicht schleht, leider beim lane etwas langsam
esta muy buena, ademas puedo usar mis propios sonidos

Me gusta mucho la musica, este programa es excelente, los aparatos son costosos, no e decidido por donde empezar en el mundo de la creacion musical, hydrogen,me parece muy interesante y divertido. gracias...

Un tres bon editeur de partitions de batterie avec des vrais sons de batterie realiste. Il et vraiment simple a utiliser mais ne sutilise pas comme un vst, ont cree un partition en 5 mn chrono et ont l'exporte en wave ou mp3 etc... puis ont importe le fichier audio dans nimporte que logiciel de MAO.
Je recommende fortement a tout ceux qui n'on pas de batterie ou ne peuvent pas en enregistrer.
